movies.title: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.description: A banker wrongfully imprisoned forms a deep friendship and patiently engineers a path to freedom inside a corrupt prison.

movies.title: The Dark Knight
movies.description: Batman faces the Joker, a chaotic mastermind who pushes Gotham—and its hero—to the edge of moral collapse.

movies.title: Parasite
movies.description: A working-class family schemes to infiltrate a wealthy household, blurring the line between opportunity and exploitation.

movies.title: The Matrix
movies.description: A hacker discovers reality is a simulation and joins a rebellion against the machines controlling humanity.

movies.title: Gladiator
movies.description: A betrayed Roman general fights as a gladiator, seeking justice against the corrupt emperor who destroyed his family.

movies.title: Inception
movies.description: A thief who steals secrets through dreams is offered redemption if he can plant an idea deep inside a target's mind.

movies.title: Interstellar
movies.description: As Earth becomes uninhabitable, explorers journey through a wormhole in search of a new home—testing love, time, and sacrifice.

movies.title: Fight Club
movies.description: An insomniac office worker and a soap maker form an underground club that unravels into a darker movement.

movies.title: The Godfather
movies.description: The aging head of a crime family hands the reins to his reluctant son, reshaping the future of the Corleone dynasty.

movies.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
movies.description: A humble hobbit sets out with a fellowship of allies to destroy a powerful ring before it corrupts the world.
